1.title: Yugioh Price Checker Project
1.desc: This is a simple application that obtains product pricing data from an external API. The user can add a product of choice into a shopping list and compare prices among the various vendors.

2.title: PDF Signer
2.desc: I wanted to make my own way to sign pdfs. This is a project where I utilize HTML canvas to render pdfs, write on them using the mouse, and print them in an A4 paper format. I used pdflib to render the pdf file onto the HTML canvas. I used jsPDF to save the canvas as a pdf.

3.title: Lawrence's Riddle me Diddle
3.desc: This is a simple trivia project. It integrates an external API to obtain trivia data. Each time you take the quiz, the questions are randomized. A score out of 10 will show at the end of the quiz. You will also see your correct and wrong answers.

1.title: Sample School Newsletter
1.desc: This is a design I copied from my alma mater, San Jose State University. This is an email project where I looked at the design and wrote the HTML and CSS from scratch. I used HTML tables for formatting to practice developing HTML emails.

2.title: Sample Promo Email
2.desc: This is a design I replicated following an email developer course. I used HTML tables for formatting to practice developing HTML emails.

3.title: Sample Transactional Email
3.desc: This is a design I found while looking through my emails. I wanted to replicate a real-life email design from a company. I used HTML tables for formatting to practice developing HTML emails.

1.title: Sample Apartment Landing Page
1.desc: This is a sample luxury apartment complex landing page.

2.title: Business Landing Page
2.desc: This is a business landing page. I used one of my favorite children cartoons as the sample business.
